title: Who is Michelle Visage married to and does she have children?
text:
That’s Queen Michelle to you… (Picture: S Meddle/ITV/REX)

Strictly Come Dancing contestant and Ru Paul’s Drag Race judge Michelle Visage is out there doing the absolute most to take the UK by storm.

Not only has she previously appeared on the UK version of Celebrity Big Brother, coming in fifth in 2015, but she’s also currently dancing her heart out on Strictly and appearing as a judge on RuPaul’s Drag Race UK every week.

As we wait for the next episode of Strictly to drop, let’s take a look at the former Seduction singer’s family life…

Who is Michelle Visage married to?

Michelle, 51, met her husband, writer David Case, when she was 26 years old.

Michelle with her family (Picture: @ReadDavidCase)

They’ve been married for 22 years, with David being a stay-at-home dad to their two children Lillie, who’s 19, and Lola, who’s 17.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The family lives in LA, California.

Michelle has previously spoken about her sexuality and how she ended up with her husband, telling the Express: ‘By the time I was 17, I was growing up in a gay lifestyle and I was at the peak of my sexuality.

‘There was more to it, I came to realise, than just black and white: there was a whole lot of grey. And I wanted to experience some of that. I played the field and I enjoyed every moment of it.

‘But, in the end, I finished up with a boy, a very sweet boy, and we’re still together all these years later.’

On the subject of her family life, the ‘Two to Make It Right’ co-singer also told the publication that her eldest daughter suffered from an eating disorder, saying: ‘Lillie has had something of a ­troubled teenagehood, battling ­anorexia.

‘But she’s doing well now. She’s my queer child: that’s the word she and her friends prefer to use. It used to be a negative term but it’s being reclaimed by what you and I might call the gay community.’

Michelle sadly has experienced anorexia herself first hand. In 2015, she told the Huffington Post: ‘I was so tough on myself at 13, with what I did to myself, with the eating disorders, the anorexia, and just striving to be skinny and wanting to be loved.

‘And the truth of the matter is, I was loved by everybody around me, more than I could handle… except for myself. I was the one who didn’t love myself. And to this day, I still struggle with it, but I’m much more aware of when I’m being mean to myself, versus when I was 13.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

After her high-scoring Cabaret routine on Strictly for movie week, Michelle wrote on her Instagram about embracing being ‘a lady of a certain age’ and still tearing up the dance floor on Strictly.

She wrote: ‘Words cannot express how grateful I am for this opportunity. I’m a 51 year old mother of two, who gets to learn how to dance from a world champion on national telly. THIS is a dream.

‘I am NOT a dancer and you all are so wonderful to be there with me and root for me and cheer me on to believe that I CAN be a dancer,’ she continued.

‘You are my life force. You are my soul. ‘When I think I can’t do it, I think of you all expecting the best from #Team Visagio’.

Michelle is due to be dancing on Strictly Come Dancing tonight, with the episode airing from 6:40pm on BBC One.

description: As we wait for the next episode of Strictly to drop, let's take a look RuPaul's Drag Race judge Michelle Visage's family life...
